narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Muhammad Arshad is a Psychiatry & Neurology, Psychiatry provider based in Gretna, LA. From 2018-06 through 2019-02, this provider received $68K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Billing stopped in 2019-02, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
